description: A classic two-player game played on a 3x3 grid. Players take turns marking a square with their symbol (X or O). The first player to get three of their marks in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) wins.

board_representation.cell_numbering: Cells are numbered 1-9, typically from top-left to bottom-right, row by row.

game_rules.move_selection: Players choose an empty cell (represented by '_') by its number (1-9).
invalid_moves: Attempting to place a mark on an already occupied cell.
Choosing a cell number outside the range 1-9.
winning_conditions: Three 'X's in a row (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal).
Three 'O's in a row (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal).
game_rules.draw_condition: If all 9 cells are filled and no player has achieved a winning condition, the game is a draw.
game_rules.game_end: The game ends when a player wins or when it's a draw.

move_format.description: A move is specified by the player's symbol and the chosen cell number.
